title: Exercises: The Bank and My Accounts

items.explanation: An ATM (Automated Teller Machine) allows you to withdraw cash at any time.

items.prompt: A Neobank is different because it has no...?
items.explanation: Neobanks are digital-only and do not have physical buildings or branches.

items.prompt: Complete: 'I have a new account. ___ account is at a Neobank.'
items.explanation: We use 'My' to talk about something belonging to 'I'.

items.prompt: Match the person with the object.
Write one sentence about your bank. Example: 'My bank is a neobank.'
